senses.de: Something that is ready for use or able to be used
senses.ex: These apples are available for baking.

Tips.title: Physical Items
Tips.description: Use 'available' for items you can physically use or borrow.

Tips.title: Not Always Free
Tips.description: 'Available' doesn't imply something is without cost, just obtainable.
Tips.example: Tickets are available at the box office.

Tips.title: Timing Matters
Tips.description: The item's availability might be limited to certain times.
Tips.example: The gym is only available in the morning.

senses.de: Someone who is not busy and is therefore free to talk or meet
senses.ex: She will be available to meet at 2 pm.

Tips.title: Planning Schedules
Tips.description: 'Available' is often used when organizing meetings or events.
Tips.example: Are you available for lunch on Monday?

Tips.title: Conveying Flexibility
Tips.description: Suggests flexibility and willingness to accommodate others' schedules.
Tips.example: I'm available all afternoon for your call.

Tips.title: Quick Availability
Tips.description: Expresses rapid readiness, often for urgent matters.
Tips.example: I'm available right now if you need help.

senses.de: Able to be bought or used
senses.ex: This product is not available in your country.

Tips.title: Market Availability
Tips.description: Use when something is available for purchase in certain locations.
Tips.example: This model is now available in Europe.

Tips.title: Release Announcement
Tips.description: Indicates when new products are put on sale.
Tips.example: The book will be available next Thursday.

Tips.title: Limited Availability
Tips.description: Signals that an item may be difficult to find or soon out of stock.
Tips.example: These shoes are available, but only while supplies last.

senses.de: Able to be obtained, used, or reached
senses.ex: Information is readily available on the internet.

Tips.title: Digital Reachability
Tips.description: Refers to online or digital items that can be easily accessed.

Tips.title: Information Access
Tips.description: Highlights accessibility of information via the internet or databases.
Tips.example: The latest research papers are available in the library.

Accessible.wordDefinition:
Accessible means something that can be easily reached or entered, or something that can be understood or used by someone.

It refers to how easy it is to get to or use something. For example, a building can be accessible if it has ramps and elevators for people with disabilities.

To sum up - accessible means something is easy to get to or use, while available means something is currently offered or existing.

Attain.wordDefinition:
Attain means to achieve or reach a goal, while available means to have access to or be able to obtain something.

For example, you can attain good grades by studying hard and completing assignments, but a scholarship may not be available to everyone.

Attain is applicable when talking about personal achievements, while available is applicable when talking about accessibility or whether something is within reach or not.

Obtain.wordDefinition:
Available means something is present or can be obtained easily. For example, there may be a lot of ice cream flavors available at the store.

Obtain means to acquire something, usually through effort or difficulty. For example, you may need to obtain a passport in order to travel to another country.

Available refers to something that is currently accessible, while obtain refers to the act of acquiring something that may not be readily accessible.

Offer.wordDefinition:
Offer means to provide something for someone to take or accept. For example, a company may offer a discount to its customers or an employer may offer a job to a candidate.

In simpler terms, available means that something is there and can be used or bought, whereas offer means that someone is giving or providing something to someone else.

On hand.wordDefinition:
The phrase on hand means that something is physically present or easily accessible. For example, a store might have a certain product on hand, meaning they have it in stock and ready to sell.

The difference between the two is that available refers to something that can be obtained or accessed, while on hand refers to something that is already present or easily accessible.

Present.wordDefinition:
Present means that something or someone is physically in a particular place or situation. For example, a teacher is present in the classroom.

Available is used when referring to something that can be used or obtained, while present is used when referring to something or someone that is physically in a particular place or situation.

Reach.wordDefinition:
Reach means to extend your arm or body to touch, grab, or grasp something.

It is often used to describe physical actions or movements, such as reaching for a book on a high shelf.

Additionally, it can also refer to the extent of influence or impact that someone or something has. For example, a celebrity might have a large social media following, which gives them a wide reach.

Available describes something that is accessible or obtainable, while reach refers to either physical extension or the extent of influence or impact.

Ready.wordDefinition:
Ready, on the other hand, implies that something is not only present and accessible, but has also been fully prepared and is in the appropriate state to be used.

For example, a meal might be ready if it has been cooked and is on the table, while it may not be available if it is still being prepared in the kitchen.

The difference lies in whether something is simply present and accessible (available) versus also being fully prepared and in the correct state for use (ready).

quotes.Text: One of the privileges you have of living the life of an artist and creating your own world and everything is the fact that, in-between times, you can kind of spend them however you want. Because, you know, once you open up your candy store again, you're open for business. And you have to be responsible. You have to be available.
quotes.Title: American Director
quotes.Name: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.Text: You are preparing yourself for a scene, and the most important thing is to remain emotionally available and remain in the moment with your scene partner. You don't want to let your own self-consciousness block the flow of creativity that's coming out so that you can act and react, and play what the scene is all about.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Gale Harold

quotes.Text: For me, choice is the most important thing because I'm going to be an adult actor pretty soon. So I've got to be choosing the right roles now so that by the time I get to that age there will be wide options available.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Haley Joel Osment

quotes.Text: As I visited the various neighborhoods in the campaign, I learned fast that it's a mistake to think that all of the wisdom and possible solutions to our problems are available only in this building.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Jane Byrne

quotes.Text: In the fashion world if you're successful, everyone loves you, and you have available every service. It's hard to walk away, except it wasn't hard for me. I had my mind completely made up.
quotes.Title: Austrian Designer
quotes.Name: Helmut Lang

quotes.Text: People sacrifice the present for the future. But life is available only in the present. That is why we should walk in such a way that every step can bring us to the here and the now.
quotes.Title: Vietnamese Clergyman
quotes.Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.Text: I would love if film doesn't disappear, if we can have film forever so we would have all these brushes, all these possibilities available.
quotes.Title: Mexican Director
quotes.Name: Emmanuel Lubezki

quotes.Text: I feel passionately that the opportunities I have had should be available to everyone.
quotes.Title: English Actress
quotes.Name: Faye Marsay

quotes.Text: The delights of self-discovery are always available.
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.Text: I'm always available to help Madrid.
quotes.Title: Brazilian Athlete
quotes.Name: Pepe
